thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: Riccardo

author: Riccardo
title: Riccardo
text:
It is a wonderful website. Helped me a lot finding an apartment in London. It put me in contact with many different families, providing the fundamental informations and allowing me to choose wisely. Homestay guarantees the security of the transaction and provides any kind of tip and service you might need while looking for accomodation abroad. Overall, an excellent tool for anyone who's interested in travelling, making new friends and sharing an international experience with a lovely and cozy family.
Final rating 5/5
